module cpx_fpbuf_p0(/*AUTOARG*/
   // Outputs
   fp_cpx_req_bufp0_cq, 
   // Inputs
   fp_cpx_req_bufpt_cq_l
   );

input	[7:0]	fp_cpx_req_bufpt_cq_l;

output	[7:0]	fp_cpx_req_bufp0_cq;


assign               fp_cpx_req_bufp0_cq[7:0]                =        ~fp_cpx_req_bufpt_cq_l[7:0];


endmodule
